extension_description.message: Fixing Thunder, QQ Xuanfeng, Flashget, Rayfile, Namipan, and QQ Temporary Chatting links. Converting URL text of above types on the webpage to a Hyperlink.

options_linktype_label.description: Options page: check this option to process (fix and decode on setting) specified links after page loading.

options_thunder_label.description: The name of Thunder Download Manager.

options_qqxuanfeng_label.description: The name of QQ Xuanfeng Download Manager.

options_plain_label.description: Options page: check this option to decode URLs like thunder://* to http://* or ftp://* without user interaction.

contextmenu_process_label.description: Context menu: click this to process (fix and decode on setting) all the links on the webpage.

contextmenu_decode_label.description: Context menu: click this to decode the link pointed to.

contextmenu_convert_label.description: Context menu: click this to convert a text selection to a link (decoded on setting).
